messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Beauty Queens was Understanding unschooling life
messages.msgSnippet: Emily gets so much makeup for gifts, she has more than I do, And I m an Avon Lady! Just before I started as one, I realized that I wasn t paying enough
messages.messageBody:
Emily gets so much makeup for gifts, she has more than I do, And I'm an Avon
Lady!
Just before I started as one, I realized that I wasn't paying enough
attention to my outside appearance, which for me is indicative of my inside.
So I started playing more with makeup and taking better care of my skin. The
new skin care regimen has done more for my feling good than makeup. I have
rotten skin so it's been nice to see it change.
I also like all the colors, purple eyeliner, seafoam green eyeshadow. It's a
blast!
I'm so shallow. lOL
*~*Elissa Jill*~*
unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people
Loving partner for life to Joey
terrible guitarist, fair singer and happy woman.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
